feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:05 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snowshower, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Snowshower
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
